trans-unit.source: PgSanity checks the syntax of Postgresql SQL files.
trans-unit.target: PgSanity checks the syntax of Postgresql SQL files.

trans-unit.source: Check syntax of sql for PostgreSQL

It does this by leveraging the ecpg command which is traditionally used for preparing C files with embedded sql for compilation. However, as part of that preparation, ecpg checks the embedded SQL statements for syntax errors using the exact same parser that is in PostgreSQL.
trans-unit.target: 它是通过利用ecpg命令来实现的,而ecpg命令是传统上用来准备编译内嵌sql的C文件的。然而,作为准备工作的一部分,ecpg会使用与PostgreSQL相同的解析器来检查嵌入式SQL语句的语法错误。

trans-unit.source: So the approach that PgSanity takes is to take a file that has a list of bare SQL in it, make that file look like a C file with embedded SQL, run it through ecpg and let ecpg report on the syntax errors of the SQL.
trans-unit.target: 所以,PgSanity采取的方法是把一个文件中的裸SQL列表,把这个文件做成一个嵌入SQL的C文件,通过ecpg运行,让ecpg报告SQL的语法错误。
